item.title: Pool Landscape with Amazing Views in Leesburg VA

item.description:

item.title: Hillside Landscaping and Pool in Chevy Chase MD

item.description:

item.title: Modern Balinese Pool & Landscape in Clifton
item.dc:creator: David Marciniak
item.description:

item.title: Ultimate Luxury Pool & Backyard in Potomac, MD

item.description:

item.title: Darnestown MD Resort Pool & Waterfalls
item.dc:creator: David Marciniak
item.description:
Where some would see and empty lot, we saw potential. This newly constructed home in Darnestown, MD had numerous restrictions including a conservation easement, a septic system we had to work around, and a lot that was anything but flat. item.title: Clifton VA Free Form Swimming Pool and Poolhouse
item.dc:creator: David Marciniak
item.description:
When designing a swimming pool one of the most important considerations is location. Many homeowners worry that a pool located away from the house won’t be used as much. item.title: Luxury Resort Swimming Pool Fairfax Station

A stately brick home sat tucked into the woods in Fairfax Station, a boring expanse of lawn stretching across the backyard.
